data.description:
**Speak Spanish, English & Japanese in VR!**

Conquer your fear of speaking through simulated interactions with virtual amigos, friends, and ともだち in 360 video encounters.

On-Demand immersive lessons with enthusiastic teachers! Use speech recognition to improve your pronunciation and progress through the interactions.

Build your confidence in realistic scenarios, which simulate the emotions and nerves of speaking a foreign language.

No need to feel embarrassed if you make a mistake, because your friends and teachers in the app can’t actually hear you! Use the **speech recognition** and answer as many times as you need to until you get it right, without judgement.

Discover the culture, history, and language in immersive, interactive 360 video Trips around the UK, Spain, and Japan.

Explore these countries with Trips, and feel like you’re on holiday, soaking up the sights and sounds of a foreign land!

Immerse yourself in guided tours around fascinating sites and breathtaking landscapes, learning about history, culture, and more.

**LIVE CONTENT:**
- 40 Japanese Lessons (JPLT N5)
- 15 episode Japanese History series (English & N2/3 Japanese)
- 5 Spanish Lessons (CEFR A1)
- 42 Trips to Spain (CEFR A2-C2)
- 46 Trips to Britain (CEFR C1/2)


**COMING SOON**
- French, German, & Italian Trips (CEFR A2-B1)
- More Trips to Japan, Britain & Spain

Subscription-based app with some free content.

Suitable for solo learners and groups (schools, colleges, etc).
